attributes.action: Offer the British public a CHOICE of voting system in his proposed referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To help reduce the look of party politics in Gordon Brown's announcement to hold a referendum on introducing the "Alternative Vote" system, why isn't the House given the opportunity to vote on giving the public an open referendum, where we, the public, get to choose whether to keep the current system, or change to a new method - of our choice. This is the only way to make the public feel it is not again being conned by MPs trying to impose something that better suits them than us!
